title: Doom.3.BFG.Edition.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Doom.3.BFG.Edition.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:


Year: October 16, 2012
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: id Software
Publisher: Bethesda Softworks
Publication Type: Repack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: enclosing (ALI213)




System Requirements:

Operating System: Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or better
Memory: 3GB
Video Card: Nvidia 9800 or better
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 11 GB


Game information:

The edition of Doom 3 BFG Edition includes an updated version
of the iconic shooter Doom 3, and complement it called Ressurection
of Evil. In addition to the familiar players history of the war on
the Martian station Doom fans waiting for brand new episodes - seven
levels under the general title The Lost Mission.

With Doom 3 BFG Edition players can even deeper dive into the atmosphere
of the legendary shooter. Optimizing graphics for modern platforms,
advanced rendering and lighting, support for stereoscopic 3D and 5.1
surround sound, the new system of conservation at the control points,
as well as support for Xbox LIVE achievements and prizes PlayStation
Network - all this will allow players to enjoy the Doom 3 for the first time.

Finally, as a special bonus for the most loyal fans of the series Doom 3
BFG Edition also contains the original Novels Doom.

Do not miss the opportunity to complete your collection of the best
shooters in the best edition with a stunning collection of Doom 3 BFG Edition.

Game Features:

An updated classic. Doom 3 is the same
in a slightly altered wrapper.
Now the levels are loaded much faster.
Also, the publication includes the first 2 parts,
with the second there is an addon.
Supplement Lost Mission for Doom 3.
And of course, gamepad support, yet dreamed about it?
Are you ready to once again plunge
into the world of Doom? Then let's go!


Repack Features:

Doom 3: BFG Edition
Do not cut / recoded
Includes Update 1
Crack text from ENPY (version of 21.09.2013)
